statements.select:
select t1.id_key, t1.request_no, t1.plan_name, t1.equipment_name, t1.port_name, t1.trans_type, t1.trans_time, t1.batch_no, t1.product_no,t1.rfid_no, t1.part_number, t1.qty, CASE t1.pass_flag WHEN '0' THEN '未放行' WHEN '1' THEN '允许放行' WHEN '2' THEN '禁止放行' END AS pass_flag, t1.destination, t1.remarks, t1.als_status, t1.create_time, t1.set_weight, t1.real_weight, t1.set_num, t1.real_num, CASE t2.load_status WHEN 1 THEN '有载' WHEN 0 THEN '空载' END AS load_status,t2.binding_time FROM View_Pm_Eqp_Production t1 LEFT JOIN view_pallet t2 ON t1.id_key = t2.product_guid
T1.RFID_NO LIKE '%'||#where.RFID_NO#||'%'
T1.PART_NUMBER LIKE '%'||#where.PART_NUMBER#||'%'
T1.EQUIPMENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.EQUIPMENT_NAME#||'%'
T1.trans_time >= #where.START_TIME#
T1.trans_time < #where.END_TIME# + 1
ORDER BY t1.trans_time,t1.equipment_name

select t1.* from view_pm_eqp_production t1
T1.ID_KEY = #where.ID_KEY#
